content: {"locationId": "6683", "organizationId": "5673", "name": "God's Storehouse Food Pantry", "address1": "401 N Franklin ", "address2": null, "city": "Nixon", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "78140", "country": null, "phone": "830-582-4060", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "29.2720219", "longitude": "-97.7624136", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Gonzales", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "God's Storehouse Nixon is a Non-Profit 501 (C) (3) status ministry Sharing God's Love and Blessings. We are a Food Pantry and Resale Shop serving the Nixon Community and surrounding areas. We are 100% Volunteer operated. Our Food Pantry is located at the corner of N. Franklin Avenue and 4th Street in Nixon. We are open on Thursday mornings from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM. In addition, there is a Blessing Box that is accessible 7 days a week, 24 hours a day. We ask that you take what you need and leave what you can.
